    Methods in Main that return Athlete
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Athlete
    GameEnvironment.createAthlete(int curWeek)
    createAthlete() is used to generate a new athlete for the team if the team is not full
    Athlete
    Market.getAthlete(int index)
    This function picks out the athlete and returns it to be displayed prior to purchase

    Description

    This function retrieves the list of the athletes in the team

    Method
    Description

    nameAthlete is called to let the player to create a nick name for the athlete.

    void
    Item.useItem(Athlete athlete)
    This function is implemented so that the athlete can consume or use the item.
